manifest:
Manifest for building NDK Vulkan validation layer binaries from master.
Uses prebuilt python.
To build this project, run extenal/vulkan-validation-layers/build-android//build.py --installdir $DIST_DIR.
Then executables are in: $DIST_DIR/vulkan-validation-layers/
For testing, use: fetch="https://android.googlesource.com/"
